name: Clarity
accolades: Washingtonian Top 100 Restaurants 2015-18, Northern Virginia Top 50 Restaurants, #3 2016
notes: Seared Hudson Valley Duck Foie Gras is a must

name: Le Jules Verne
notes: Located within the Eiffel Tower. Good, not great.

name: Franklin Barbecue
accolades: James Beard Foundation Award, Best Chef: Southwest 2015
notes: Best brisket I've ever had, period.

name: Kinship
notes: Maine Lobster French Toast is unreal. Also the ossetra caviar is incredible, if you can splurge.

name: Taco Bamba
accolades: Best of Northern Virginia, NoVA Magazine
notes: Guac made from grilled avocados. The signature Taco Bamba and the street corn are a must.

name: Founding Farmers
accolades: Open Table 100 best brunch spots in America 2018
notes: The brunch buffet is incredible. The Jefferson Donuts are amazing.
